verbose_text: EMT enhances cell survival by expressing genes that aid cells in avoiding apoptosis (programmed cell death), anoikis (cell death due to loss of cell adhesion), cellular senescence (the process of limited cell replication), and even host immune response.
evidence: EMT enhances cell survival by expressing genes that aid cells in avoiding apoptosis (programmed cell death) , anoikis (cell death due to loss of cell adhesion), cellular senescence
